The Windows Actvation file in this torrent contains MALWARE.  Do no use this file to activate.  Instead there's a Windows Activator.exe  torrent file which scanned free of malware.  Otherwise, the rest of the Vista Home Basic torrent should be usable.

If for whatever reason you cant use Win7 "hardware for example"
then this is the Vista you want to be running, A+ good torrent, ty
